Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Linda Burke
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my husband who loves to fly fish.  He dropped his old camera in the river so I knew I needed something more waterproof.  I was very pleased to find this camera for him.  It is so compact but has so many features.  And when I bought the bundle it was all I needed.  It's a great value, easy to use and lightweight. I would recommend this camera to everybody.  It's great
